name: Rei Reltroner
description: A transformative visionary and the silent guardian of Astralis against the Spiral.
quote: He never looks back because he carries every ruin forward.

name: Kamila Alena
description: The silent origin of Nytherion's chaos, carrying pain turned into strategy.
quote: She never raised her voice, yet entire nations shifted.

name: Velgrin Altherion
description: A quiet force born from absence, balancing destruction and silent longing.
quote: I am not what you fear. I am what you left.

name: Faye Callister
description: Once a warm presence, now battling echoes of trauma from Nytherion’s pull.
quote: He’s not a savior. He’s the reason the world still has something left to save.

name: Wayne Astoner
description: His clarity echoes Rei’s early days — potential waiting to ignite.
quote: There’s something about him that makes me want to go further. As if he sees a version of me that hasn’t arrived yet.

name: Queen Valethra Seraphine Lunara
description: A timeless ruler harmonizing spiritual clarity and moral power.
quote: Our methods differ, but his presence anchors the harmony we strive for.

name: Albert Locke
description: A quiet observer of metaphysics, rationality, and truth systems.
quote: He speaks few words, but every step he takes echoes in the laws of logic.

name: President Regulus Rigel
description: Reltronland’s strongest hand of order — relentless and precise.
quote: He is the still point in a storm of progress.
